    • Constructor Detail

      • SCUIValidationUtils

        public SCUIValidationUtils()

    • Method Detail

      • getEmailValidator

        public static ISCUIValidator getEmailValidator()
        Returns email validator of type ISCUIValidator, which on call returns SCUIValidationResponse. This validator checks for '^[a-z]{1}[\\w-\\.]+@\\w+\\.\\w+$' regex email validator

      • getPhoneValidator

        public static ISCUIValidator getPhoneValidator()
        Returns phone validator of type ISCUIValidator, which on call returns SCUIValidationResponse. This validator checks for '((\\(\\d{3}\\))|(\\d{3}))([-\\/\\s\\.])\\d{3}\\4\\d{4}' regex or 10 digits phone validator

      • getCreditCardValidator

        public static ISCUIValidator getCreditCardValidator()
        Retuerns credit card validator of type ISCUIValidator, which on call returns SCUIValidationResponse. This validator checks whether credit card number passes Luhn's algorithm. credit card validator

      • registerFieldAttributes

        public static void registerFieldAttributes(java.lang.String type,
                                           java.util.List list)
        registers list of attributes for a validation type. An attribute can be registred for multiple validations. Throws SCUIException if the validator for validation type is not registered type list

      • registerFieldAttributes

        public static void registerFieldAttributes(java.lang.String type,
                                           java.lang.String attr)
        registers attributes for a validation type. An attribute can be registred for multiple validations. Throws SCUIException if the validator for validation type is not registered type attr

      • registerValidator

        public static void registerValidator(java.lang.String type,
                                     ISCUIValidator val)
        Validations can be plugged-in using this function type val

      • isValid

        public static SCUIValidationResponse isValid(java.lang.String attr,
                                             java.lang.String val)
        validates passed value and returns SCUIValidationResponse as response .

        NOTE: Caller of this method have to localize response string.

        attr val validation response
